channel.title: Unable to get the server online
channel.description:
hello... i have follow everystep on this post ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html ) and when i compile and then run my server comes online; when i try to log on via moparscape using my ip e-scape.no-ip.info i cannot log in... i tried logging in with 'localhost' and i can get in but no one else can. i tried adding my server to the serverlist on this site but it won't let me because its ofline... i have no-ip running while i try to do this (it is on the taskbar) and i still can't get it going... i'm not sure if this is whats supposed to happen when i run the server so i just want to check. [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l248/bonneau_14/dhdhd.jpg[/img]
it there a step i'm missing to open this server to the public? please help and if you need more information i can provide it... Thank you.

item.title: Unable to get the server online
item.dc:creator: @Vossler Vossler
item.description:
@Vossler wrote:

i will portforward again but this time i’ll show you guys what i have and see if its correct… i’m using a d-link DIR-655 and this is what it looks like:

[i blocked out my IP, i know i ts right though]

it would also be great if you could list the little thing i have to do to get the server running… ( i.e. run your run.bat file, ect. )

Thanks Again.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to get the server online

item.title: Unable to get the server online
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

No-ip is simply a redirect to your IP, it will not “help” other than the simplicity of remembering it.
It’s the exact same as for example, don’t is equal to do not. Instead of typing do not, you can type don’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to get the server online

item.title: Unable to get the server online
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Do you have No-ip DUC? It helps a lot although im not sure you need it to host online

item.title: Unable to get the server online
item.dc:creator: @Vossler Vossler
item.description:
@Vossler wrote:

hello… i have follow everystep on this post ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html ) and when i compile and then run my server comes online; when i try to log on via moparscape using my ip e-scape.no-ip.info i cannot log in… i tried logging in with ‘localhost’ and i can get in but no one else can. i tried adding my server to the serverlist on this site but it won’t let me because its ofline… i have no-ip running while i try to do this (it is on the taskbar) and i still can’t get it going… i’m not sure if this is whats supposed to happen when i run the server so i just want to check.

it there a step i’m missing to open this server to the public? please help and if you need more information i can provide it… Thank you.
